roleset.name: to reach or achieve

example.name: transitive
example.text: A lot of the nuclear weapons tech that was unattainabe 20 - 30 years ago is attaintable now . It would be very expensive , and there would be consequences .
example.arg: A lot of the nuclear weapons tech that was unattainabe 20 - 30 years ago

example.name: All args
example.text: The highest peaks of the mountain were attainable to me and my agents, and the lowest valleys were made plain paths.
example.arg: The highest peaks of the mountain

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2 & 3. Framed by Claire. Relation to verb-attain.01.
